name: Draco Demo/Beta
description: Just the a small portion of what I'm working on. Not a ton to see at first glance but hopefully it'll at least be somewhat entertaining and I hope you enjoy it! Note: This project is being developed on RPG Maker so, many of the resources are rather bland/generic. I've done some researching and found programs I'd like to eventually obtain to overhaul/revamp the game with but, cannot afford them at the moment. Anyone willing to help donate to the cause, even if it's just a few pennies will be very appreciated. If not, that's ok as well, my biggest concern is just wanting to share this and help entertain others.
